resources.string: Blind bags are small bags that contain 1 mini pony per bag.\n They do not indicate by name which pony is in which bag because it is meant to be a surprise.\n For those that hate surprises, the bags also have a number printed on them that allows you to figure out which pony is in which bag.

Numbers can either be 1-2 digits or 5 digits.\n For five digit numbers, just ignore the 1st, 3rd and 5th number and have the original index number.\n For instance, number 20415 is really just #01 or #1, and 22445 is just #24.
Wave 8 no longer printed number codes,\n but instead has 2 digit letter codes stamped right below the \'www.mylittlepony.com\' print on the front of the bag.\n The codes are AA-AZ, minus AJ and AQ.

This application is made by FrankkieNL and Fluffikens.
 The original (flash) application is made by Jaroslav Vozar.
 Images by:
 Remmy, Sarah G, Tropical_Sunset, Collec-Jcg, Strawberryreef.com, Hasbro, Mlp4merch.tumbler.com, Leddaq
